function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Rise in demand for delivery services due to the pandemic","Impact":"Strain on delivery services and increased risk of contagion during delivery","Mitigation":"Expansion of delivery services and implementation of contactless delivery methods","Technologies":"GPS tracking, contactless payment systems, and delivery route optimization software","People":"Delivery personnel, customers, and restaurant staff","Owner":"Delivery companies, restaurants, and technology companies"},{"Description":"Lack of effective vaccine for COVID-19","Impact":"Continued uncertainty and risk of prolonged social distancing measures","Mitigation":"Investment in research and development of vaccines, implementation of strict hygiene and safety protocols","Technologies":"Vaccine development technologies, advanced hygiene and sanitization systems","People":"Public at large, healthcare workers, vulnerable populations","Owner":"Pharmaceutical companies, healthcare organizations, research institutions"},{"Description":"Shift towards new normal of social distancing and shelter at home","Impact":"Disruption to service organizations reliant on human interaction, and decreased demand for in-person services","Mitigation":"Adoption of digital and remote service delivery, implementation of strict health protocols for in-person services","Technologies":"Teleconferencing software, remote service platforms, health monitoring technologies","People":"Service providers, customers, and vulnerable populations","Owner":"Service organizations, tech companies, and healthcare institutions"}]}
